examples: This kind of work exhausts me
I'm beat
He was all washed up after the exam
this car consumes a lot of gas
We exhausted our savings
They run through 20 bottles of wine a week
exhaust one's savings
We quickly played out our strength

definitions.text: use up the whole supply of
examples: We have exhausted the food supplies
combustion products are exhausted in the engine
the plant releases a gas

definitions.text: drained of energy or effectiveness; extremely tired; completely exhausted
examples: the day's shopping left her exhausted
he went to bed dog-tired
was fagged and sweaty
the trembling of his played out limbs
felt completely washed-out
only worn-out horses and cattle
you look worn out

definitions.text: depleted of energy, force, or strength
examples: impossible to grow tobacco on the exhausted soil
the exhausted food sources
exhausted oil wells
the day's events left her completely exhausted--her strength drained
